other_tests.findings: Diagnosis of primary myelofibrosis (PMF) with grade 2 myelofibrosis (MF) exhibited in the biopsy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Biopsy exhibited MF grade 1 during further diagnostic tests.

other_tests.findings: Revealed 45, X/46, XX, confirming the diagnosis of Turner syndrome (TS).
No structural defects in the heart and major vessels.
Large cystic mass measuring 30 mm × 148 mm on the right ovary, indicative of a serous cystadenoma.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Abdominal CT later detected an ovarian cystic mass measuring 236 mm × 143 mm × 255 mm on the right side.

other_tests.findings: Revealed splenomegaly (114 mm × 100 mm × 163 mm), cirrhosis, and portal hypertension.
